processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Files are arranged chronologically by film release year.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Contains research files, clippings, correspondence, reviews, promotional materials, and transcripts related to documentaries produced by Merrimack Films.
